comment: I m writing a book on teaching from the perspective of a Black high school teacher in Baltimore and some of her teacher friends in the city and surrounding area . Of the issues they ve raised and I ve covered charter schools ain t it . The call is from inside the house .
amr:
# ::snt I m writing a book on teaching from the perspective of a Black high school teacher in Baltimore and some of her teacher friends in the city and surrounding area . Of the issues they ve raised and I ve covered charter schools ain t it . The call is from inside the house .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / write-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (b / book
                  :topic (t / teach-01))
            :manner (p / perspective
                  :poss (a / and
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (h2 / high-school)
                                    :ARG2 (t2 / teach-01))
                              :location (c / city
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Baltimore")))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 p2
                                    :ARG2 (f / friend))
                              :quant (s / some)
                              :location (a2 / and
                                    :op1 c
                                    :op2 (a3 / area
                                          :ARG1-of (s2 / surround-01
                                                :ARG2 c)))))))
      :snt2 (a4 / and
            :op1 (ii2 / issue-02
                  :ARG1-of (r / raise-01
                        :ARG0 (t3 / they)))
            :op2 (c2 / cover-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (s3 / school
                        :mod (c3 / charter))
                  :polarity -))
      :snt3 (c4 / call-02
            :location (ii4 / inside
                  :op1 (h4 / house))))

comment: I'm trying to change things happening to kids in my school . I've also worked in poorly run charter schools & interviewed at one where I was expected to teach using chants . No dice .
amr:

      :snt1 (t / try-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)

                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :beneficiary (k / kid
                              :location (s / school
                                    :poss ii)))))
      :snt2 (a / and

                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG2 (s2 / school
                        :mod (c2 / charter)
                        :ARG1-of (r / run-01

                  :mod (a2 / also))
            :op2 (ii3 / interview-01
                  :ARG1 ii2
                  :ARG2 (s3 / school
                        :location-of (e / expect-01
                              :ARG1 (t3 / teach-01
                                    :ARG0 ii2
                                    :manner (c3 / chant-01)))))
            :snt3 (d / dice
                  :polarity -)))
